summary: This document is an invoice from FedEx addressed to Jeffrey E. Epstein for shipping services rendered. The invoice details charges, discounts, and payment information, indicating a total amount due of $95.73. It also includes shipment details for a package sent to Ghislaine Maxwell.

persons.name: Jeffrey E. Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey E. Epstein is the individual to whom the invoice is addressed, indicating he is the account holder for the FedEx services.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Ghislaine Maxwell is mentioned as the recipient of a package shipped via FedEx, indicating a connection to Epstein.

connections.description: Ghislaine Maxwell is identified as the recipient of a package sent by Epstein, suggesting a personal or professional relationship.

events.title: Package Shipment
events.description: A package was picked up by FedEx for shipment to Ghislaine Maxwell.

locations: 457 Madison Ave FL 4, New York, NY 10022-6843
keyFacts: The invoice is dated December 15, 2003, and is for a total of $95.73.
The invoice includes charges for transportation, special handling, and VAT.
A package was shipped to Ghislaine Maxwell on September 5, 2003.
Jeffrey E. Epstein is the account holder for the FedEx services.
The document indicates a fuel surcharge and a discount applied to the invoice.
